data.name: Dungeon Full Dive
data.detailed_description:
What is Dungeon Full Dive?

DFD is the most immersive way to play tabletop RPGs online. Bring your tabletop stories to life in DFD by creating your own 3d-maps, characters, and campaigns. Explore your fantasy adventures with your friends in a classical top-down mode or in a –never seen before– first-person mode. Dungeon Full Dive stays true to the classic round-based combat mechanics, dice and magical worlds, but takes it to the next level!

More immersive than ever

Place monsters & characters and switch into their view to experience the adventures in their place. For the first time ever interact with the environments of your tabletop adventures: Drink in the tavern, play some instruments at the city market or explore the dark forests. DFD makes your adventures more immersive than ever before!

Build your own Maps

You can choose, adapt and create your own battle maps. DFD offers a wide variety of lovingly, handcrafted 3d maps for you to directly use for your adventures or to modify with our map editor. Of course, you can also create your own maps in the map editor from scratch!

Create and customize your hero

DFD's potent character editor allows you to create and customize your own characters and miniatures.

Automation and Stat Integration

Play any tabletop RPG that you want. Create and modify your character sheets and notes ingame. Furthermore, DFD includes game mechanics and stat integration for 5e. That means that things like initiative tracking can easily be done with just a click of a button.

Crossplay for Mouse & Keyboard and VR

DFD can be played with mouse & keyboard... or in VR! And of course: cross-play is supported between all PC-Players and VR-Players. So you will be able to play with all of your friends (and online strangers).

data.short_description: Dungeon Full Dive is a TTRPG that will make your tabletop worlds real. Walk around in the worlds of your adventures: may it be a forest deep inside the kingdom of elves or a cozy tavern for the adventurers to rest. Create your own adventures in Dungeon Full Dive!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Final requirements are subject to change
